title: We stop chasing chaos
description: This isn’t as much as a prediction for 2026 as it is my hope: that the media will not be so entranced by President Trump’s compulsion to dominate every news cycle and instead focus limited resources on stories that matter, stories that hold the powerful accountable, and stories that help people make the best decisions...
